Articles.Content: Is there any plan on taking Kerbal on 64 bits for Mac OSX? I am pretty sure there are other players/kerbonauts wishing to be able to use all their ram.

Hi rodrigoelp, and welcome aboard!

As far as I know, there are no current plans to add 64-bit support for Mac OSX; I'm not 100% sure if that is a Unity limitation or a choice by Squad (I think the former). 

Seeing as this is on the [What Not To Suggest list](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/36863-What-not-to-suggest), I'm afraid this thread must be closed.
